heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Wildlife Act 1976 (Protection of
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Wildlife Act 1976 (Protection of 

Wild Animals) Regulations 2022.

heading: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on 3 October 2022.

title: section 23 of the Wildlife Act 1976 (No. 39 of 1976), the Heritage (Transfer of
heading: 3. The Basking Shark shall be an animal to which section 23 of the
text_raw:
3. The Basking Shark shall be an animal to which section 23 of the 

Wildlife Act 1976 (No. 39 of 1976), applies. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th October, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine concurs with the making of 
the foregoing Regulations. 

[485] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 September, 2022. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 29 September, 2022 

MALCOLM NOONAN, 
 Minister of State at the Department of Housing, Local Government 

and Heritage 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [485]

title: section 23 of the Wildlife Act 1976 (No. 39 of 1976), the Heritage (Transfer of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

The effect of these Regulations is to confer ‘protected wild animal’ status on 
the Basking Shark under section 23 of the Wildlife Act, 1976. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [485] 5
